page.title: 09THE VICAR,6 MONTHS LATER
page.content: What a different place it is now,in the middle of{July.}The sun is shining ,the farmers are very busy and we have met lots of people. The children have far more people to play with than when we lived in Cheltenham. I have joined the local cricket team. One of the great things we have had was{Marsh Gibbon Club}feast day when it seemed that all the village turned out and there was a fair in the afternoon. When we lived on the edge of a large town we had next door neighbours and we miss saying hello to them. Here we do not have any neighbours because the school is right next door. Both town and country have different things to offer.
